name: Delores Landry
description: Beautiful plant. Looks healthy and vibrant, much better than what I expected. Especially for my first plant order online.

name: Rosanna Henson
description: Loved it at first. Green, lush. But just like many many other buyers, after a month, I noticed the leaves were browning.

name: Zimmerman Haynes
description: I can't find a way to contact the company - I would like a partial refund as I will now need to buy a pot to put it in

name: Booker Lowe
description: I would like to discuss the wonderful nightmare I had with this product. My wife and I were super excited for this product to arrive.

name: Chavez Wiley
description: I was really excited to get this and to start growing herbs. But I opened the box, followed the instructions closely and set this up.

name: Lawanda Ingram
description: I got this as a birthday present for my husband, the classic man who's impossible to buy for, and he was thrilled with it.
